price: Mmoadoma bebree na wͻ’nnsoa wͻn akͻnhoma (anaasε wͻ’nni ahoͻden sε wͻ’tumi hwehwε wͻn akonhoma). Nyankopͻn na Ɔbͻ wͻn ne mo (nyinaa) akͻnhoma. Ɔne Otiefoͻ no a Ɔte biribiara no, Ɔne Onimdefoͻ no.
arabic: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن دَآبَّةٖ لَّا تَحۡمِلُ رِزۡقَهَا ٱللَّهُ يَرۡزُقُهَا وَإِيَّاكُمۡۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waka-ayyin min dābbatin lā taḥmilu riz'qahā al-lahu yarzuquhā wa-iyyākum wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
